items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to take that kind of risk.
Tom doesn\'t want you to get angry with him.
Tom died when his truck crashed into a tree.
Tom disappeared into one of the other rooms.
Tom is one of the best poker players I know.
Tom is rich enough to buy anything he wants.
Tom is still not very good at French, is he?
Respect yourselves and you\'ll be respected.
Who would\'ve thought that Tom would change?
I should\'ve known you couldn\'t be trusted.
The police officers aimed their guns at Tom.
I didn\'t know what I\'d done wasn\'t legal.
This is a really beautiful place, isn\'t it?
It\'s almost too good to be true, isn\'t it?
You shouldn\'t have talked to Tom like that.
Tom thought he had a chance to win the race.
What\'s your favorite kind of fish to catch?
What\'s your favorite non-electrical gadget?
I stole some food because I was very hungry.
I\'m the one who gave Tom your phone number.
